org.waarp.common.utility

Class DetectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.common.utility.DetectionUtils

  • public final class DetectionUtils
extends Object
    Utility that detects various properties specific to the current runtime environment, such as Java version.

    • Method Summary
